metadata.description: Wiley Schlub was your average everyday laser fanatic... until three totally hot girls wearing brightly-colored clothing appeared in his room and told him he's the future savior of humanity! Since then, he's been sucked into so many crazy adventures that he can't keep track! He's fought alien monsters, gotten his gender switched for extremely iffy reasons, been turned into an anthropomorphic mouse, and even gotten that popular cheerleader from school to notice him! These are the truly outrageous adventures of Wiley Schlub, the first man in history to be WICKEDPOWERED.
metadata.name: WICKEDPOWERED
